mil7.2.6:1.1_0: “Anyone who is going forth should not be shared out? What are the five factors that should be realized?”
mil7.2.6:1.2_0: “Suppose there was a water jar, great king, or of water.

mil7.2.6:1.4_0: This is the first part of the body:
mil7.2.6:2.1_0: Furthermore, when an whirlpools lifted up my head, they see me again and again, they don’t see me again: ‘When they see me!’

mil7.2.6:2.3_0: This is the second kind of lower deceiver.
mil7.2.6:3.1_0: Furthermore, out of compassion, sun, and moon sun,
mil7.2.6:3.2_0: In the same way, a cow with a maiden of the household life, when it comes to a dagger, she should dry yourselves and sun it out.
mil7.2.6:4.1_0: Furthermore, in a mounter, a mountar, or a poisoned inhabited area.
mil7.2.6:4.2_0: In the same way, when these cases, a sage should give up possessions, honor, and popularity, encounter, in an empty hut, where they meditate like a mountain cave, quiet, still, far from the madding crowd, remote from human settlements, and fit for seclusion.
mil7.2.6:4.3_0: This is the fourth part of a body.
mil7.2.6:4.4_0: When you have spoken, great king, the senior monk Upasena of Vaṅganta
mil7.2.6:5.2_0: a monk should stay in lodgings
mil7.2.6:6.1_0: Furthermore, when you wander into the other state of existence you hear what you’ve seen or heard, hear what you’ve already got rid of or throatshed, and kept silent.
mil7.2.6:6.2_0: In the same way, great king, the sound of a cow with their trunks, treasury, making a catchwork, pushing, and venerating all around the necks’s material possessions, honor, and popularity.
mil7.2.6:6.3_0: This is the fifth opportunity to go.
